name: Fullstack Engineer, Freemium (Remote Eligible EMEA)
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.

name: Senior Data Engineer, Experience
desc: We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join our Experience Mission department. Our teams are responsible for all of Spotify’s consumer experiences across our mobile apps as well as platforms like desktop, web, TVs, smart speakers, cars, wearables, and partner application integrations to make Spotify available wherever our users are. We are hiring a Senior Data Engineer who is passionate about data to focus on building structured, high-quality data solutions. These solutions will be used to evolve our products bringing better experiences to Spotify users and the global artist community alike. We are processing petabytes of data using tools such as BigQuery, Dataflow and Pub/Sub. When needed, we also develop our own data tooling such as Scio, a Scala API for Apache Beam. Furthermore we use Google's Machine Learning stack with Tensorflow and Kubeflow at the heart of our ML systems.

name: Associate Product Manager, Podcasts and Talk Formats
Consumer Insights Lead
desc: We are looking for a top researcher to join our Premium Consumer Insight team for the Freemium Strategy Business Unit in Stockholm. You will work on developing new business opportunities for our subscription business, which makes up 90% of Spotify’s revenues. Above all, your work will impact the way the world experiences music.

name: Backend Engineer, Content Platform
desc: Spotify is looking for Backend Engineers to join our Content Platform engineering organization. Content Platform is a central enabler for Spotify. Together, our teams ensure that Spotify has a complete, available and enriched catalog of music, podcasts, videos and more. Come join our team of talented backend engineers that share a common interest in distributed backend systems, their scalability and continued development.You will build the backend systems that power our application, scale highly distributed systems, and continuously improve our engineering practices. Above all, your work will impact the way the world experiences music.

name: Director of Product Insights, Core Experience
Engineering Manager, Commerce Platform (EMEA)
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.

desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.

name: Senior Backend Engineer, Platform Insights
desc: The Platform Insights team consists of highly motivated and very friendly individuals, specialising in providing core datasets, discovering insights, and providing guidance related to developers’ effectiveness and data-informed decisions across the Platform mission.We gather data from our software development processes and from our quarterly Engineering Satisfaction survey. We use this data to identify bottlenecks, make Spotify faster, and promote data-informed decisions.

name: Senior Software developer, Freemium, for the Soundtrap hub
iOS Engineer, Consumer Platform
desc: The Platform department builds the technology ecosystem that enables Spotify to learn and deliver quickly, while safely and easily scaling to billion customers, and enabling our rapid employee growth around the globe. Our team consists of six organizational units that reflect the needs and groupings of our internal customers. We support the craft and practice of designers, engineers, researchers, and data scientists by developing the frameworks, capabilities and tools they need to do their work effectively, quickly, and safely. We are an amplifier for efficiency, quality, and innovation across all of Spotify!

name: Senior Backend Engineer, Consumer Experience
desc: We are looking for engaged and hardworking Senior Backend Engineers to join our Experience Mission department. Our teams are responsible for all of Spotify’s consumer experiences across our mobile apps as well as platforms like desktop, web, TVs, smart speakers, cars, wearables, and partner application integrations to make Spotify available wherever our users are.

name: Product Manager, Consumer Experience, Playback API
Senior User Researcher , Design Platform
desc: We are looking for a Senior User Researcher to join our Design Platform team and help identify, prioritise and drive user research initiatives across several areas including our Encore design system team and Design Operations.

name: Flutter Mobile Developer, Music Creation
desc: Soundtrap is the world’s leading browser based Digital Audio Workstation (DAW). Acquired by Spotify in 2017 and primarily based in our Stockholm headquarters we provide a collaborative music and podcast recording studio on the web and mobile.The mobile team is making sure the Soundtrap experience on mobile devices is top notch. We currently have two apps released. The Soundtrap Studio, written in React Native and available on iOS and Android. In addition, in October 2020, we launched the Soundtrap Capture app, written in Flutter and available on iOS.

name: Senior Engineering Manager, Customer Service Platform (EMEA)
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.

name: Senior Product Manager, Onboarding
desc: Your mission will be to build an outstanding onboarding experience for Spotify’s client developers and the Client Platform products as well as defining how we best enable our users. You’ll set up the long-term strategy and define the roadmap for developing our current solutions, partnering with a cross-disciplinary set of folks across the globe to make Spotify a leader in developer impact. We are in the early stages of this offering and you will be a part of crafting the vision.

name: Design Manager, Core Experience
desc: We are looking for an experienced product design manager to join our Core Experience that is responsible for crafting the mobile app experience for Spotify. This team is at the heart of Spotify, developing new features and experiences for our listeners.

name: Senior Product Manager, Royalties & Reporting Platform
Engineering Manager, Freemium Ada (Remote Eligible EMEA)
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.

name: Head of Core Product, Soundtrap Hub
Senior Backend Engineer, Fraud Detection and Prevention
desc: Spotify is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join the User Fraud team! Our mission is to ensure the integrity of Spotify’s growth by building groundbreaking technical solutions processing billions of events in real-time. A key component of our results-oriented goals is to detect, mitigate, and prevent unwanted behavior on our platform.You will join an experienced team of data, backend, and client engineers that owns our fraud mitigation and prevention platform. We use state-of-the-art data engineering and backend techniques to build a platform that can operate at a very high scale without compromising speed or accuracy. Working as a Senior Backend Engineer in the User Fraud area will challenge your design, quality, and problem-solving skills to build robust and scalable solutions.

name: Senior Security Engineer, Threat Detection and Response
desc: The Spotify Security team is looking to advance our in-house threat detection and response capabilities. If identifying threats and adversaries using logs and security telemetry excites you, if threat hunting exercises and building alerts to stay ahead of attackers gets your heart pumping, if you are up for the challenge to manage security incidents and drive enterprise-wide efforts for containment and response, you might want to consider joining us!

name: Partner Engineer
desc: Speakeasy is on a mission to empower one hundred million users to engage with Spotify in the most effortless and intuitive way through partner assistants experiences. Anywhere, at any time, for anyone.

name: Backend Engineer, Streaming Security, Consumer Experience
desc: Delivering the best Spotify experience as possible. To as many people as possible. In as many moments as possible. That’s what the Experience team is all about. We use our deep understanding of consumer expectations to enrich the lives of millions of our users all over the world, bringing the music and audio they love to the devices, apps and platforms they use every day. Know what our users want? Join us and help Spotify give it to them.

name: Head of Creator Marketing, Soundtrap
desc: We’re looking for a passionate marketing leader to join the Soundtrap Freemium Business unit. They will be responsible for the Creator Marketing team with an overall mission to establish Soundtrap as the #1 creative tool for music making and podcast creation globally.Utilising your experience to help grow the Soundtrap community, awareness of the brand, and the value it offers musicians, songwriters and podcasters. Ultimately, you’ll be a key part of a team reimagining the way creators use the Soundtrap platform.

name: Software Development Engineer in Test, Payments
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.We are looking for an experienced Software Development Engineer in Test to enable and encourage developers to craft and implement tests in an efficient way by providing them with the right tools, frameworks, and infrastructure! You will be working in the area that is responsible for enabling payment services to the whole of Spotify, from taking a regular Spotify subscription payment to e.g. a business ad sales payment.

name: Senior Product Manager, Mobile Search & Browse Experience
Senior Backend Engineer, Mercury (Remote Eligible, EMEA)
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.

Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.

name: Android Engineer, Freemium Mission
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.We are currently hiring in 4 of our teams in this department. One of those works on Spotify Lite, a lightweight version of the Spotify app which is available in 42 markets across Asia, Latin America, Middle East and Africa.. This team focuses a lot on optimizing for application size and data consumption of the application. Two other teams work on our main music app, and they work on features for onboarding new users, the start screen, sign up flow and finding out which artists and podcasts users are interested in. The fourth team is working on exploring and refining our premium product offering, especially in emerging markets. Our teams work across multiple platforms and work with Machine Learning to bring the most relevant content to our users.

name: Software Engineer, Studio, For the Soundtrap Hub
Senior Backend Engineer, Core Infrastructure (Remote Eligible, EMEA)
Senior Product Manager — Holistic Experience & Mobile Design System
Senior Product Manager, Database Platform
desc: We’re looking for an experienced product manager to help lead our Database Platform in Spotify’s Core Infrastructure team - we are Spotify’s division dedicated to building out industry leading cloud-native infrastructure and backend developer experience. Our vision is to provide the foundations for a reliable and secure developer platform that allows Spotify’s thousands of engineers to iterate quickly and also allows us to scale our user base!

name: Senior Backend Engineer, Royalties and Reporting (Remote Eligible, EMEA)
Android Engineer, Design Systems
desc: As a Design Systems Engineer, you will contribute your technical know-how and design aesthetic to push Spotify's current design standards to an even higher level. You’re the kind of person who is passionate about design systems, collaboration and inclusion. You’ll live in the space between design and development, pushing the boundaries of user interface design and design systems. An eye for detail is essential as you develop UI and animation libraries, design tools and foundational frameworks. The impact of your work at Spotify will be significant as you ship a system which powers products that are a part of the lives of millions of users every single day.

name: Backend/Data Engineer (Remote Eligible, EMEA)
desc: The Platform department creates the technology ecosystem that enables Spotify to learn and deliver quickly, while safely and easily scaling to billion customers, and enabling our rapid employee growth around the globe. Our team consists of six organisational units (known as ‘tribes’) that reflect the needs and groupings of our internal customers.We seek challenging technical problems that address business critical needs for teams all over Spotify, and engage in large open-source code bases (Luigi, Flyte, Styx), while working in a friendly, collaborative, and safe environment. We are an amplifier for efficiency, quality, and innovation across Spotify.

name: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Messaging
desc: The Freemium R&D team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.We are a team in the Freemium mission working on optimizing the customer journey. We are currently working on communicating the right value to the right users at the right time through a multi-channel messaging experience (email, push, in-app, etc), ensuring that all users retain and progress through every stage of the customer journey. Additionally we work closely with others teams within Freemium on the personalization of the sign-up/sign-in and onboarding Spotify experiences. We are a cross functional team applying Machine Learning across all our problem spaces.

name: Senior Software Engineer, Studio, for the Soundtrap hub
desc: Do you want to be part of building a platform where creators can collaborate on music and storytelling projects, and where educators can build learning opportunities? Soundtrap is the world’s leading browser based Digital Audio Workstation (DAW). Acquired by Spotify in 2017 and primarily based in our Stockholm headquarters we provide a collaborative music and podcast recording studio on the web. As an engineer in the Studio team, you'll be working at the heart of Soundtrap's innovative browser-based DAW. We’re constantly implementing new features and improving the user experience. This is done using state-of-the-art web APIs, such as Web Audio, across all major browsers.

name: Staff Data Engineer, Experience
desc: This Staff Engineer will evolve our offering and our partner integrations by promoting sound engineering practices, driving work on technical strategy, regularly assessing the technical state of our architecture, and giving focused support to specific teams as necessary. You will help ensure that our solutions are scalably balanced, reliable, architecturally sound, and that technical debt is both incurred consciously and repaid within a reasonable time. You are also encouraged to mentor other specialists to support them in their career growth.

name: Combined Engineering Manager and Product Manager, SDKs and APIs
desc: Spotify lets our users engage throughout a wide variety of home-grown and partner-built applications, delivering magnificent audio experiences to millions of fans wherever they are.
